<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Wayang Whisperblade](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1363)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

In hushed tones, superstitious people tell their children stories of wayangs— living shadows who come out at night to eat misbehaving children. Mostly, these stories are just fictions of fearful minds, but it's true that wayangs were originally creatures of shadow, straddling the edge between light and darkness.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 17

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 12
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Wayang.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Wayang Whisperblade](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1363)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Shadow" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=143" />
<trait label="Wayang" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=370" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 290</row>

**Perception** +9; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Shadowtongue](/Languages.aspx?ID=21)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +4, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +6, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +6, [Shadow Plane Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** +3

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[Kukri](/Weapons.aspx?ID=56) (2), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +5 

+1 to all saves vs. [darkness](/Traits.aspx?ID=39) or [shadow](/Traits.aspx?ID=143)
</row>

**HP** 19

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
kukri +8 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 1d6 slashing

**Shadowplay** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Illusion](/Traits.aspx?ID=92), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [Shadow](/Traits.aspx?ID=143)) **Requirements** The wayang's last action was a melee Strike that damaged their opponent; **Effect** The wayang attempts to [Tumble Through](/Actions.aspx?ID=29) the opponent's space, with a +2 circumstance bonus to the [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) check. If they succeed, the wayang leaves a shadowy afterimage in their original space, and the opponent is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against the next melee attack the wayang attempts against it before the end of their current turn.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   The wayang deals an extra 1d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

</column>
